segments.text: I ’ m not a Christian . I just want to know why Americans believe that sort of thing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know ... like , say God is the creator of the universe , the Bible , and Jesus Christ ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You don ’ t believe that ? Everyone interprets the Bible in a different way . To some people , the Gospel 5 is a source of much comfort .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you believe , John ? Are you Christian ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To tell you the truth , I don ’ t know if I ’ m a Christian or not . Christians don ’ t often share the same belief . But I believe that we all possess , by the grace of God , the potential to create fantastic changes on this earth .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you believe that one religion is better than another ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , all religions are essentially based on the same ideals , so no one is really better .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you go to church regularly ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When I ’ m home in the States , I go , but not in China .
segments.speaker: S2
